Package com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation

Interface Summary
CreditCardValidator Purpose: Defines the contract a CreditCardValidator must implement for this component to use it.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCreditCardValidator Purpose: an abstract implementation of a CreditCardValidator that provides most of the base functionality of the CreditCardValidator interface and provides some new functionality: the ability to 'or' validators together and the ability to mutate the algorithm.
AmericanExpressValidator Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate AmericanExpress issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
CreditCardValidatorRegistry Purpose: Acts as a registry for all the CreditCardValidators that are defined by this component and/or the application and can be initialized from a configuration file.  The validators contained within this class are mutatable by the application.
CustomValidator Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will allow the application to setup it's own validator.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
DinersClubValidator Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate Diners Club/Carte Blanche issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
DiscoverValidator Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate Discover issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
JCBValidator Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate JCB issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
MasterCardValidator Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate MasterCard issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
VisaValidator Purpose: implementation of a CreditCardValidator that will validate Visa issued credit cards.  See CreditCardValidator for the contract and AbstractCreditCardValidator for how the validation works.
